content:
This is only for passwords, you can skip the monit and use Thunderbird without entering anything.

There should be a description in Settings similar to this: A Primary Password protects all your passwords.

Please read this article explaining what does it do: Protect your Thunderbird passwords with a Primary Password.
creator: TyDraniu
